fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose an adjective to give to someone, the host will give them a custom Passive/Effect/Debuff based on the selected adjective.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may self-target once, the adjective you give yourself will not count for your goal.
- If a player dies with an adjective, it will be added behind their role name on death. (Ex: Energized Mafioso)

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Make sure 2 of your adjectives affect the game in some way. (Causing a death, Protecting someone, Giving info)
